actions.committee: Committee on Energy and Natural Resources
actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Energy and Natural Resources.

official_title: A bill to ban the exportation of crude oil produced on Federal land, and for other purposes.
short_title: American Oil for American Families Act of 2008

summary.text: American Oil for American Families Act of 2008 - Bans the export from the United States of petroleum extracted from public lands in the United States (including lands located on the outer continental shelf (OCS)), or a petroleum product produced from such petroleum.

titles.title: American Oil for American Families Act of 2008
A bill to ban the exportation of crude oil produced on Federal land, and for other purposes.
